title: TimescaleDB Schema
prompt: Create an entity-relationship diagram (ERD) for trading database schema. Show three main tables as rounded rectangles: 'candles' table (primary, largest) with columns: time, symbol, timeframe, open, high, low, close, volume - marked as hypertable with clock icon. 'trades' table with columns: id, time_open, time_close, symbol, direction, entry_price, exit_price, sl, tp, pnl. 'signals' table with columns: id, time, symbol, direction, regime, poi_type, quality_score, executed. Show relationships with connecting lines (one-to-many). Include TimescaleDB elephant logo. Use PostgreSQL blue (#336791) as primary color. Dark background (#0F172A). Clean database diagram style with proper PK/FK indicators.
negative_prompt: too many tables, cluttered relationships, hard to read column names, inconsistent styling
